title: Tiszapolgár-Basatanya
description: A Chalcolithic cemetery located at modern Polgár, Hungary, with at least 156 graves. This site is the typesite for the Tiszapolgár or Tiszapolgár-Româneşti culture, an Eneolithic archaeological culture. This archaeological culture has been identified on the Great Hungarian Plain and elsewhere in eastern, central Europe. It dates ca. 4500-4000 BCE.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Tiszapolgár-Basatanya after Meisenheimer 1989 and Wikipedia.
